text: Acanthonevra scutellopunctata is a species of fly described by German entomologist Erich Martin Hering in 1952.Bisby F.A., Roskov Y.R., Orrell T.M., Nicolson D., Paglinawan L.E., Bailly N., Kirk P.M., Bourgoin T., Baillargeon G., Ouvrard D. (red.) (6 September 2011). ”Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: 2011 Annual Checklist.”. Species 2000: Reading, UK. ==References== Category:Phytalmiinae
title: Acanthonevra scutellopunctata
